title: Python Software Foundation
shortDescription: The Python Software Foundation is a non-profit that manages Python's development and community!
detailedDescription: The Python Software Foundation (PSF) is an independent non-profit organization that holds the copyright on Python versions 2.1 and newer. The PSF's mission is to advance open source technology related to Python and to publicize its use. They organize PyCon conferences, provide grants to Python projects, and ensure Python remains free and open source.
